title: Successful login with valid credentials
description: Verify that users can successfully authenticate using correct email and password credentials via Supabase Auth and maintain session persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid registered email
Enter correct password
Click the login button
Verify that the user is redirected to the dashboard with the correct role-based access
Confirm session token is created and persists after page refresh

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that the login attempt fails with incorrect email and/or password and appropriate error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid or unregistered email
Enter incorrect password
Click the login button
Check that authentication fails and error message for invalid credentials is displayed
Verify no session token is created

title: Role-based access control enforcement on routes
description: Ensure that all protected routes enforce RBAC middleware correctly, restricting access to unauthorized roles, and allowing it for authorized roles.

steps.description: Login as user with role 'resident'
Attempt to access admin-only pages (e.g., billing management, user management)
Verify access is denied and appropriate error/redirect occurs
Login as user with role 'admin'
Access all role-protected pages
Confirm successful access to allowed pages
Access security officer pages
Verify only users with 'security_officer' role can access these pages

title: Dashboard statistics update and quick actions
description: Verify that the dashboard displays accurate Total Residents, Houses, and Payments counts reflecting the current database state and quick action buttons navigate correctly.

steps.description: Login as admin or appropriate role
Confirm that the count cards show correct numbers by cross-verifying with backend data
Click quick action buttons (e.g., Add Resident, Add Payment)
Verify navigation to the corresponding new entry form

title: House management - Create and edit house with validation
description: Verify creation and editing of house records with proper form validation using Zod schemas, including mandatory fields and filtering by street and house type.

steps.description: Navigate to house management page
Open new house creation form
Submit the form with missing mandatory fields
Verify validation errors are displayed appropriately
Fill form with valid data including street and house type
Submit the form successfully
Confirm new house appears in the listing
Filter house list by street and house type
Verify listing updates to match filters
Edit an existing house record and save changes
Confirm updated information is reflected in the table

title: Resident management including auto-generated codes and status filtering
description: Test creating, editing, and filtering residents with status options and linking to houses. Confirm auto-generation of 6-digit resident codes.

steps.description: Navigate to residents module
Initiate new resident creation
Submit the form leaving required fields empty
Check validation error messages
Fill form with valid data including house linkage
Submit form
Confirm resident is created with an auto-generated unique 6-digit code
Filter residents by status (e.g., active, inactive)
Verify listed residents match selected status
Edit an existing resident's details and save
Confirm updates are reflected accurately

title: Payments module - currency input, bulk actions, CSV export, and receipt printing
description: Validate that payment creation uses the custom currency input with correct formatting, supports bulk actions, exports CSV correctly, and prints receipts matching screen data.

steps.description: Navigate to payments list page
Open new payment form
Enter payment amount with decimal and comma formatting
Verify currency input accepts and displays formatted value correctly
Submit new payment
Confirm payment is listed with correct amount
Select multiple payments and perform bulk delete or export
Verify bulk actions complete successfully
Export payment data as CSV
Check CSV file matches displayed data
Open a payment and print receipt
Confirm printed receipt matches the payment details on screen

title: Automated invoice generation and payment status updates
description: Test scheduled invoice generation works correctly, payments update invoice statuses, and overdue invoices trigger notifications as expected.

steps.description: Simulate or trigger invoice generation for residents
Verify invoices are created with correct billing profiles and due dates
Record payments against invoices
Confirm invoice status updates to paid or partial accordingly
Simulate passage of due date without payment
Verify invoice is marked overdue and notification is triggered

title: Wallet system balance display and manual adjustment
description: Ensure residents' wallet balances display correctly and manual credit or debit adjustments operate properly with validation.

steps.description: Access a resident's wallet information
Verify current wallet balance displays accurately
Open manual adjustment dialog
Attempt adjustment with invalid input (e.g., negative numbers, non-numeric)
Check for validation errors
Make a valid credit adjustment and save
Confirm wallet balance increases accordingly
Make a valid debit adjustment and save
Confirm wallet balance decreases accordingly

title: Security contacts - read-only display and validity period checks
description: Verify that the security contact list is shown as read-only with accurate details and validity periods displayed correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the security contacts module
Confirm that the list is visible without any editing capability
Verify that each contact shows correct access codes and validity periods
Check no interface elements allow modification

title: Audit logging captures all create, update, and delete operations
description: Ensure that all CRUD operations on key entities generate correct audit log entries with accurate actor and timestamp information.

steps.description: Perform create operation on a resident record
Verify audit log entry records the creation by the correct user with timestamp
Update a house record
Confirm audit log entry reflects the update with actor details
Delete a payment record
Check corresponding delete audit log entry is created

title: Comprehensive form validation using Zod schemas
description: Test all forms across houses, residents, payments, and billing modules to validate input constraints, field types, and mandatory fields using Zod schemas.

steps.description: Open each module's create/edit form
Submit forms with invalid, incomplete, or malformed input data
Validate that proper descriptive error messages are shown per invalid field
Submit forms with all valid data
Confirm forms submit successfully without errors

title: Currency input component formatting and validation
description: Verify the currency input component handles decimal points and comma delimiters correctly and prevents invalid monetary values.

steps.description: Type various monetary values into currency input including large numbers, decimals, and commas
Check the input formats the number correctly with commas separating thousands and allows decimal points
Attempt invalid input such as letters or multiple decimal points
Verify input prevents invalid characters or formats

title: CSV export functionality for payments and residents
description: Confirm that exporting data as CSV generates accurate files that match the onscreen filtered data and formatting standards.

steps.description: Apply filters to payment and resident tables
Initiate CSV export
Download and open CSV file to confirm content matches filtered records
Verify CSV format correctness and data integrity

title: Mobile-first responsive design and offline capability
description: Test the platform's layout adapts fluidly across different device sizes and retains critical functionality offline for essential modules.

steps.description: Open the app on multiple devices or simulate different screen sizes including mobile, tablet, and desktop
Verify UI components adapt correctly e.g., collapsible sidebar, navigation menus
Disable internet connection and access critical functions like viewing resident information or security contacts
Confirm app provides offline capability for these features without errors

title: Integration with payment gateways Paystack and Flutterwave
description: Validate end-to-end payment processing with third-party gateways including successful transactions and error handling scenarios.

steps.description: Initiate a payment transaction using Paystack
Verify the transaction completes successfully and payment record updates accordingly
Simulate a failed payment scenario (e.g., insufficient funds) with Flutterwave
Confirm error handling shows appropriate notification and payment state does not mark as completed

title: Audit log review interface accessibility and filtering
description: Test that audit logs can be accessed and filtered by administrators and show accurate details of actor, action, and timestamp.

steps.description: Navigate to audit log page as an authorized admin
Verify that audit logs load successfully
Apply filters such as by date range, user, or operation type
Confirm filters work correctly and only matching log entries display

title: Reference management for streets and house types with billing profiles
description: Verify creation, editing and deletion of reference data such as streets and house types and associating them with billing profiles.

steps.description: Navigate to reference management page
Create a new street and assign to billing profile
Confirm new street appears in the list with correct billing profile linkage
Edit an existing house type and change associated billing profile
Verify update is saved and visible in UI
Delete a reference entry
Confirm removal from the system and no residual data remains
